scripts.build:ssr: pushd pwa && yarn run build:ssr && popd && mv build/assets/pwa/SSR.js scripts/build && node tasks/buildIndex.js
scripts.build: yarn run clean && pushd pwa && yarn run build && mv build/* ../build/assets/pwa && popd && node tasks/buildIndex.js && yarn run build:ssr
scripts.clean: rm -rf pwa/build pwa/dist build/assets/pwa scripts/build/* && mkdir -p build/assets/pwa
scripts.deploy: npm run build && moov deploy pepboys-pwa-demo/pepboys-pwa-demo -ignore-live
scripts.deploy:nginx: ln -sf $(pwd)/nginx.development.conf /usr/local/etc/nginx/servers/pepboys-pwa.conf && ln -sf $(pwd)/build/assets/pwa /usr/local/var/www/pepboys-pwa && sudo brew services restart nginx
